Package application

Class PlataformaController

java.lang.Object
application.PlataformaController
public class PlataformaController
extends java.lang.Object
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for some of the critical functions that the Singleton class Platform (the class where the app runs around) hosts methods to save or load data via files, or establish/reset the connection to the users API among others.
